items.name: Dinner: Viwa Island Resort, Fiji
items.description: Dinner on the beach, under a canopy of stars, is one of Viwa Island Resort's highlights, with a Fijian feast of lobster, fish and prawns available to accompany the evening.

items.name: Dinner: Viwa Island Resort, Fiji
items.description: Dinner on the beach, under a canopy of stars, is one of Viwa Island Resort's highlights, with a Fijian feast of lobster, fish and prawns available to accompany the evening.

items.name: Lunch: Viwa Island Resort, Fiji
items.description: Lunch at Fiji's Viwa Island Resort is a calm, cheerful affair of carrot salads and fish curries - wholesome, vibrant nourishment after a morning spent visiting the exuberant schoolchildren of a remote village on Fiji's westernmost island in the South Pacific Ocean

items.name: Alfred, Oslo
items.description: Named for Alfred Nobel, the resident cafe of Oslo's Nobel Peace Centre is a placid stop for a sandwich of Norwegian smoked trout bolstered by butter from Raros, Snofrisk cream cheese, caraway and capers

items.name: Alex Sushi, Oslo
items.description: Seafood is such a staple in Oslo, so it's no surprise that Japanese sashimi joints are serious business here, from relatively traditional restaurants like Alex Sushi, where nigiri is draped in substantial cuts of salmon, halibut, hamachi, sea bass, bluefin tuna and scampi, alongside a glorious gunkan topped with ikura and a quail egg yolk
